name: Building Improvements
description: Increase building variety, layering, and visual interest

iterations.note: Added structural variety: rooftop details (antennas, props), side decorations (pipes, AC units), building features (balconies, overhangs), and pattern-based window placement (grid, alternating, columns, etc.)

Enhanced building visuals: expanded color palettes with peachy/lavender residential and blue-gray industrial tones, improved window lighting with 50% warm glow + 15% cool blue tint variety, enhanced rooftop details with 2-5 varied props and colored antenna lights, vibrant neon signs with 6-color palette and multi-layer glow effects, colorful striped awnings for shops
